name: should create a splits query with espn open scores
description: Test case for should create a splits query with espn open scores
expected_query: with "base_years" as (SELECT unnest(ARRAY[${all_years.join(',')}]) as year), "player_years" as (SELECT DISTINCT player.pid, base_years.year FROM player CROSS JOIN base_years), "t4cb8a1aba8c721c1043c416c36ac86dc" as (select "pg"."pid", ROUND((1.5 * COUNT(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.trg_pid = pg.pid THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0)) + (0.7 * SUM(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.trg_pid = pg.pid THEN nfl_plays.dot ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(SUM(nfl_plays.dot), 0)), 4) as weighted_opp_rating_from_plays, "nfl_plays"."year" from "nfl_plays" inner join "player_gamelogs" as "pg" on "nfl_plays"."esbid" = "pg"."esbid" and "nfl_plays"."off" = "pg"."tm" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and ("trg_pid" is not null) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "pg"."pid", "nfl_plays"."year") select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "player_seasonlogs"."espn_open_score" AS "espn_open_score_0", "t4cb8a1aba8c721c1043c416c36ac86dc"."weighted_opp_rating_from_plays" AS "weighted_opp_rating_from_plays_0", "player_years"."year", "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "player_years" on "player_years"."pid" = "player"."pid" left join "player_seasonlogs" on "player_seasonlogs"."pid" = "player"."pid" and player_seasonlogs.year = player_years.year and "player_seasonlogs"."seas_type" = 'REG' left join "t4cb8a1aba8c721c1043c416c36ac86dc" on "t4cb8a1aba8c721c1043c416c36ac86dc"."pid" = "player"."pid" and t4cb8a1aba8c721c1043c416c36ac86dc.year = player_years.year group by player.fname, player.lname, "player_seasonlogs"."espn_open_score", "t4cb8a1aba8c721c1043c416c36ac86dc"."weighted_opp_rating_from_plays", "player_years"."year", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
